Articles.Content: The user below me understands that I know what a paradox is, but what was stated as one was not.

True. And false. I know and also don't know it.

The user below LOST THE GAAAAAAAME.

True, but anyone who read that would lose the game so you've created another paradox.

The user below will create another paradox to confuse everyone.

False

The user below me will contribute a shovel so I can beat the user above me to death for misusing the term "paradox" more than a hipster Emmett Brown

False

The user below me will explain how I have misused the term paradox

Well, lets see here... False.

The person below me will say true.

False.

The user below me knows what a paradox really is.

true.

The user below me has over 100 posts

False.

The user under me has never hit a puppy/kitty.

True.... I love kittens...

The user below me has had an argument with someone in the youtube comments section recently.

False, don't even have an account

The user below me has made Jeb scream

True and proud of it. In fact, he hasn't been on any of my missions in a while since, but i know it's impossible to scare Jeb out of spaceflight.... Isn't it? 0_o

The user below me has made a Close Call landing (running out of fuel and a few hundred meters to go.......)

Edited May 9, 2013 by Dynamo
The user below me has already landed to and returned from Tylo without using an overkilled and/or over-engineered spacecraft.

False

The user below me hates candy

Completely false. Who could hate it?

The user below me uses Steam instead of KSP Store.

True, mainly because I found it on steam to being with then found the site and forums.

The user below me has sent Jeb on a one way trip.

Indeed. Fortunately, he was rescued from the doomed Pol Munbase by a crack rescue team composed of Bob, Bill and Kerfler I think it was.

Person below me is an avid Elder Scrolls fan.

Oblivion only.

The user below me likes donuts over bagels.

False, hate them both,

The user below me has used a glitch to destroy the mun

False, now I want to know this glitch.

The user below me will put false as their answer.

False (It's Opposite Day)

The next user has landed a spaceplane on Minmus.

False. I'm not even yet a full-fledged professional KSP player either (you know what I mean by that...).

The user below me is a full-fledged professional KSP player (by my definitions).

True-ish- With every update there's more to discover though.

The user After me refuses to use mechjeb's auto-Ascent feature.

True? Non-mechjeb user here.

The user below me is an introvert.

True.

The next user has been in New York City at some point in their life.
